sentences.sentence: I can't stand those mouthy brats.
sentences.translation: 我无法忍受那些吵吵闹闹的小孩。

sentences.sentence: You're the traitor, ya mouthy pig!
I guess I was very mouthy about other products out there, but all the others out there were crap and expensive.
sentences.translation: 我想我对产品是说了大话，但其他人说的都是废话，而且产品还很贵。
